text: Crafted Heavy Armour
Mercenaries often outfit their troops with additional armour that has been specially crafted, a cost too great for standing armies.
XVI Battle Standard

A testament not only to the thirty-four that fell but to the sixteen men that survived the onslaught of over two hundred Greenskins. It took over five hours but the greenskins were slain to the last goblin and the convoy, they were protecting, managed to retreat back to the safety of the Empire in the infamous battle at Black Fire Pass.
Brigands Way
Brigands are known for ambushes and what better way than with the use of smoke bombs.
Earthworks
Hiring an imperial engineer and a few sappers will allow us to defend our artillery from enemy fire at the cost of manoeuvrability and a large sum of gold.
Glory to the Empire
Camp Grows
You have conquered in the name of the Empire - glory to you - glory to the Empire!
As the Grudgebringers success spreads around the Empire, many seek us out to swell our ranks.
Imperial Reinforcements
Hired Mercenary
You will receive what men, if any, the Emperor can spare for your mission.
This unit will bolster our ranks.
High chance to receive reinforcements in the form of Imperial State Troops or Mercenaries.
Receive one mercenary unit.
Imperial Satellite
A place to rest our weary bones and while the nobles run the settlement, we will defend it.
Retain settlement with limited construction options.
Liberator
You are the breaker of chains and the people rightfully adore you for it.
Fountain of Light
The fountain of Light can heal even the most gravest of injuries ensuring all our troops are fighting fit.
Camp Followers
These men reduce the burden allowing us to cover more ground and eventually those that prove themselves can join our ranks but some seem untrustworthy.
Unit Replacements
These men will replenish our depleted ranks.
Grudgebringer Mercenaries
Veterans of many campaigns the Grudgebringer mercenaries are hailed as heroes from the courts of Altdorf, Zhufbar, Loren and beyond.

The banner of Arcane Warding is inscribed with sigils to twist magic aside and deflect it in unpredictable paths. When a hostile spell is cast against a regiment bearing this banner the spell is likely to be either negated or deflected towards the closest enemy regiment.
Banner of Arcane Warding
This hallowed banner has been infused with power and can lash the enemy with bolts of pure energy. It may be cast, unleashing up to six mighty lightning bolts upon enemy troops within range
Banner of Wrath

This powerful banner infuses the bearer's regiment with extra courage, making them braver and more determined. A regiment bearing this banner will never break from hand-to-hand combat and is immune to fear.
Banner of Defiance
Mercenary Legends

I have the knowledge, I have the skill, and you can follow me if you will! How many years have you been scraping for a living-five, ten, fifteen? Well, show me the men and I'll put together a fighting force to shame the Reiksguard and the Panthers and the whining White Wolves of Middenheim to boot! Are you with me, Grudgebringers?
Mercenary Camp
Mercenaries have set up camp here. Any army within its circle of influence will be able to recruit units from the camp.
Artisan Blades
Each weapon is hand crafted and perfectly balanced, making its wielder a dangerous prospect.
Outcast Knights
As their leader was, by only hiring exiled or rejected cavalrymen we gain hardy men with something to prove.
Arabyan Steed
There are no better horses to be bought than the Arabyan steeds, that move with a swiftful grace.
Blessed Brass Balls
Andrey has a contact in Kislev who can supply brass cannon balls metled down from church bells blessed by Ursun priests.
Nuln Weaponry
Bernhardt has many contacts in Nuln and is able to procure the finest weapons, ammunition and parts for his men.
Moonstone of the Hidden Ways
Able to use the many pathways of the Worldroots to gain an advantage over their foes in battle.
Grand Prince of Ostland Patronage
With his father being the Elector Count Valmir von Raukov along with a suitable donation, will see the Prince become this units patron bestowing much prestige and attracting many stubborn Ostlanders.
Troll Hides
Sigmar's Scriptures
Order of the Prince
Knights of the Inner Circle
Skaven Slayer
Cavalry Barding
Ragnar's Wolves are no stranger to the tough hides of Trolls but to fashion them into armour requires expensive Dawi tools.
While the scriptures are expensive they imbue it's wearer with a zealous desire to cleanse all evil.
Only the finest regiments of the Carlsson army are awarded the Order of the Prince as such attracting only true warriors or those worthy of promotion.
Inner Circle Knights, make up the deadliest, highest-ranking and most experienced warriors within any knightly order.
They exist only to kill skaven and do so gladly, they adorn their banners and persons with rat skulls, bones, viscera and fur.
The finest hand crafted cavarly barding, the true mark of worthy cavalrymen.
